textAfterTable: NOTE: This size chart is made to help find the right size of gi for each person. However, the variables of each persons size and proportions, such as weight, height, build, arm length, leg length and other measurements will influence the gi size each person will need. Please understand that these estimates are not to be used as exact guidelines, but more of an average reference guide.
